character.name: Cleo
description: Capable of <c=keyword>temporarily upgrading and downgrading</c> cards in your hand and benefiting from them.

UpgradesInHand.name: Upgraded Cards in Hand
UpgradesInHand.description: Equal to the number of Upgraded cards in your hand.

UpgradesInDiscard.name: Upgraded Cards in Discard
UpgradesInDiscard.description: Equal to the number of Upgraded cards in your Discard pile.

UpgradesInExhaust.name: Upgraded Cards in Exhaust
UpgradesInExhaust.description: Equal to the number of Upgraded cards in your Exhaust pile.

UpgradesInDraw.name: Upgraded Cards in Draw
UpgradesInDraw.description: Equal to the number of Upgraded cards in your Draw pile.

ImproveA.name: Improve A
ImproveA.description: <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its A upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImproveB.name: Improve B
ImproveB.description: <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its B upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

Impair.name: Impair
Impair.description: <c=boldPink>Downgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in hand to its non-upgraded version. The downgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImproveAHand.name: Improve Hand A
ImproveAHand.description: <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> every eligible card in hand to its A upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImproveBHand.name: Improve Hand B
ImproveBHand.description: <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> every eligible card in hand to its B upgrade. The upgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

ImpairHand.name: Impair Hand
ImpairHand.description: <c=boldPink>Downgrade</c> every eligible card in hand to its non-upgraded version. The downgrade lasts until the card is played, or until combat ends.

SelfImproveA.name: Self Improve A
SelfImproveA.description: <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> this card to its A upgrade. The upgrade lasts until this card is played, or until combat ends.

SelfImproveB.name: Self Improve B
SelfImproveB.description: <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> this card to its B upgrade. The upgrade lasts until this card is played, or until combat ends.

SelfImpair.name: Self Impair
SelfImpair.description: <c=boldPink>Downgrade</c> this card to its non-upgraded version. The downgrade lasts until this card is played, or until combat ends.

ImprovedA.name: Improved A
ImprovedA.description: The next time this card is played it acts as an <c=boldPink>Upgraded</c> version of itself. Lost on play (if it does not <c=boldPurple>Exhaust</c>) and the end of the fight.

ImprovedB.name: Improved B
ImprovedB.description: The next time this card is played it acts as an <c=boldPink>Upgraded</c> version of itself. Lost on play (if it does not <c=boldPurple>Exhaust</c>) and the end of the fight.

Impaired.name: Impaired
Impaired.description: The next time this card is played it acts as a <c=boldPink>Non-upgraded</c> version of itself. Lost on play and the end of the fight.

CleanUp.name: Clean Up
CleanUp.description: At the end of your turn, exhaust the leftmost <c=boldPink>Non-upgraded</c> card in your hand and gain Temp Shield equal to its cost. <c=downside>Reduced by one afterwards.</c>

Swapper.name: Swapper
Swapper.description: During your turn, you may spend this on a card. If it is not upgraded, give it <c=cardtrait>Improved A</c>. Otherwise, give it <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> and <c=cardtrait>Impaired</c>.

Nanomachines.name: Nanomachines
Nanomachines.description: When you are hit by an attack gain Temp Shield equal to the attack's damage. <c=downside>Goes away at the end of the turn.</c>

EnhancedTools.name: ENHANCED TOOLS
EnhancedTools.description: The first time you play an <c=cardtrait>Improved</c> a card each fight, <c=keyword>Improve</c> another card with the same upgrade.

ReusableMaterials.name: REUSABLE MATERIALS
ReusableMaterials.description: After playing a card with <c=cardtrait>Improved A or B</c>, gain 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

Kickstart.name: KICKSTART
Kickstart.description: At the start of each fight <c=keyword>Improve A</c> the first 2 eligible cards you draw.

MagnifiedLasers.name: MAGNIFIED LASERS
MagnifiedLasers.description: If your rightmost card is an upgraded card it has +1 to all <c=keyword>Attacks</c> on it.

UpgradedTerminal.name: UPGRADED TERMINAL
UpgradedTerminal.description: Draw an extra card for every 2 upgraded cards you draw, to a max of 3 per turn.

Retainer.name: RETAINER
Retainer.description: Cards no longer lose <c=cardtrait>Improved</c> when played.

ExpensiveEquipment.name: EXPENSIVE EQUIPMENT
ExpensiveEquipment.description: Non-upgraded cards that cost 3 or more energy start each fight with <c=cardtrait>Improved A</c>. Upgraded cards that cost 3 or more energy start each fight with <c=cardtrait>Discount</c>.

PowerEcho.name: POWER ECHO
PowerEcho.description: The first time you play an upgraded card each turn, create an <c=cardtrait>Impaired</c>, <c=cardtrait>Single Use</c>, <c=cardtrait>Temporary</c> <c=keyword>copy</c> of it in your hand.

CleoBooks.name: SUMMONING STAFF
CleoBooks.description: The first time you play a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c>.

CleoCat.name: NEVERMIND
CleoCat.description: During combat, when choosing a card to add to your deck, you may choose <c=card>None of the Above</c> instead.

CleoDizzy.name: FORTIFY
CleoDizzy.description: <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c> also increases the amount of <c=status>SHIELD</c> cards give. Each combat, choose a card in your deck to <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c>.

CleoIsaac.name: CARE PACKAGE
CleoIsaac.description: On the first turn of each combat, add either a <c=card>Supply</c> or a <c=card>Demand</c> to your draw pile.

CleoMax.name: TREND CHASER
CleoMax.description: Every 3 turns, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> all copies of the most abundant card in your deck. Ties result in no discount.

CleoRiggs.name: PLAN B
CleoRiggs.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> if a card in your hand is upgraded to B.

description.None: Draw an <c=keyword>Upgraded</c> card from your Draw pile.
description.A: Draw an <c=keyword>Upgraded</c> card from your Draw pile.
description.B: Draw three <c=keyword>Upgraded</c> cards from your Draw pile.

description.None: Gain <c=status>SHIELD</c> equal to your max Shield. Impair 2.
description.A: Gain <c=status>SHIELD</c> equal to your max Shield. Impair 1.
description.B: Gain <c=status>SHIELD</c> equal to your max Shield. Impair 2.

description.None: Move right 1 and fire a Seeker for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.A: Move right 1 and fire a Seeker for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in your <c=keyword>Discard pile</c>.
description.B: Move right 1 and fire a Seeker for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in your <c=keyword>Exhaust pile</c>.

description.None: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in your hand to its <c=keyword>A upgrade</c>.
description.A: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in your hand to its <c=keyword>A upgrade</c>.
description.B: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the 2 rightmost eligible cards in your hand to their <c=keyword>B upgrades</c>.

description.None: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all non-upgraded cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.
description.A: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all non-upgraded cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.
description.B: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all non-upgraded cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.

description.None: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +1 dmg after each attack.
description.A: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +2 dmg after each attack
description.B: Pierce attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in hand. +1 dmg after each attack

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=8A3388>Cleo</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=8A3388>Cleo</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=8A3388>Cleo</c> cards to your hand.
